title: Expert Training Program for Implementing and Researching Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening UDL-based instructional design competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply the three principles of the UDL framework (engagement, representation, action & expression) to actual instructional design
Learners will be able to develop flexible teaching-learning materials that consider diverse learner needs
Learners will be able to design and operate UDL-based assessment tools even in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
